message: Let's split it 60-40, fair and square!
You got 60% in the first round, I'll offer you 30% this time. Accept or keep negotiating!
I'd like to negotiate further, I want a higher percentage this time.
I'll give you 30%, but I think I deserve more after the first round!
You're being greedy, I'll give you a better deal. 55% is a fair compromise!
I'm not sure if 55% is the best I can get. I'd like to negotiate further.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more than 55%. Let's meet in the middle!
